name: project-x-monorepo
description: Monorepo do Projeto X - Backend (NestJS) + Frontend (React + Vite)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend run build && pnpm --filter backend run build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend run lint && pnpm --filter frontend run lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter backend run format && pnpm --filter frontend run format
scripts.vercel-build: pnpm --filter frontend run build && pnpm --filter backend run build
